title: Business Analyst , Bangalore
description:
Job Purpose

Are you an experienced Software Business Analyst? Do you want to be part of a team that provides innovative solutions to dental professionals and patients around the world? If so, Straumann Group Software Centre in Madrid is the place for you!

Straumann Group is a global leader in dental implants and orthodontic solutions, and we are looking for a talented front-end software developer to join our team. As part of a growing team of specialists, you will be part of a team of engineers developing software tools for dental professionals and patients, including dentists, surgeons, and dental technicians.

As a Software Business Analyst, you will define, modify and review functional and non-functional specifications/requirements, and will dig into the analysis tasks alongside development team and dental professionals stakeholders (e.g. dentists, surgeons, dental technicians) as well as consumers to provide fully detailed technical documentation. Part of the job will entail to manage a BPMN App, expertise within this domain will be highly appreciated.

As part of a growing team of specialists, working for a world market leader in dental technology, he will be responsible for managing SCRUM ceremonies (grooming, specifications, etc). You will be part of an agile team that values collaboration and creativity, and you will have the opportunity to work in an international environment for a product-based company.

Main Tasks And Responsibilities


As a Software Business Analyst you will:
Define and review specifications and requirements, documentation.
Document, challenge and clarify PMs requirements
Interact with medical professionals to better understand requirements and collect feedback on software products developed.
Ensure alignment between business needs, UX designs and technical specs
BPMN App modeling and functional work
Assist the PM in acceptance tests
Test product backlog items in integration env. and dev
Protect team from outside interruptions and distractions
Finds opportunities for collaboration across international teams, works on cross-team commitments, and achieves scale by enabling the work of others.

Requirements


BE/B.Tech with 8+ years of relevant expereince.
Experience as a teamwork, and communication leader
BPMN Experience (Flowable or similar tools)
Good to have -Real world experience on SCRUM
Analysis of software requirements and definition of software tasks
Alignment between business needs, UX designs and technical specs
Knowledge of Azure DevOps
Experience on Atlassian Confluence
Desirable:
Development skills such as backend and front-end frameworks (Spring, TypeScript, React JS)
Experience with healthcare software
Knowledge in FHIR standards
Professional fluency in English

Personal Attributes


Keen to create world class healthcare solutions with an international team
Thorough and attention to details
Interest and ability to understand the full software stack.
Happy to reuse work from others and able to make the difference where we need to set us apart.
Humble when it concerns understanding the customer requirements. Bold when it comes to backing up his/her team and delivering the solutions needed by the market.
